sections.title: Track Your Containers in Real-Time
sections.subtitle: Seamlessly monitor your shipments from any part of the globe
sections.name: HeroSection
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to the future of container tracking with our cutting-edge real-time API. Ensure your cargo is always safe and exactly where it should be, all with a few clicks.

images.name: Hero Image
images.description: A shipping yard with multiple containers and a digital interface overlay.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Leading the way in container tracking technology
sections.name: AboutSection
sections.label: About
sections.content: **API de Rastreamento de Contêiner** is dedicated to delivering the most reliable and accurate container tracking solutions on the market. Our mission is to provide businesses with the tools needed to streamline supply chain logistics and improve operational efficiency. With a focus on innovation, our team of experts works tirelessly to push the boundaries of what's possible in real-time tracking technology.

images.name: About Background
images.description: Team working on digital interfaces and tracking software.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.name: ServicesSection
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
- **Real-Time Tracking**: Monitor your containers with live updates and precise location data.  
- **API Integration**: Seamlessly integrate our API into your existing systems for enhanced functionality.  
- **Custom Alerts**: Set notifications for specific events or changes in status.  
- **Detailed Analytics**: Access comprehensive reports and insights to better understand your logistics operations.

images.name: Services Infographic
images.description: An infographic showing the services offered by the API including tracking, integration, and analytics.

sections.title: Client Testimonials
sections.subtitle: What our customers have to say

sections.content:

sections.title: Latest News
sections.name: NewsSection
sections.label: News
sections.content:
Stay updated with the latest advancements and updates on our API technology.  

**April 2024 Update**: We’ve enhanced our API functionalities, integrating even more efficient tracking algorithms for greater accuracy.  

**March 2024**: Partnered with Global Freight Network to bring advanced tracking capabilities to a wider audience.

images.name: News Icon
images.description: An icon representing news and updates.

sections.title: FAQ
sections.subtitle: Common questions answered
sections.name: FAQSection
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
**Q: How accurate is the real-time tracking?**  
A: Our tracking data is accurate up to a 10-meter radius, providing you with precise location information.  

**Q: Can I customize alerts?**  
A: Yes, our system allows you to set up custom notifications for various shipment events or milestones.

images.name: FAQ Icon
images.description: An icon representing frequently asked questions.
